vegetarian.label: Vegetarian
vegetarian.description: No meat or fish, but may include dairy or eggs.

pescatarian.label: Pescatarian
pescatarian.description: No meat, but fish allowed. Dairy and eggs allowed.

ovo.label: Ovo-Vegetarian
ovo.description: No meat or dairy, eggs allowed.

lacto.label: Lacto-Vegetarian
lacto.description: No meat or eggs, dairy allowed.

lacto_ovo.label: Lacto-Ovo Vegetarian
lacto_ovo.description: No meat or fish, dairy and eggs allowed.

flexitarian.label: Flexitarian
flexitarian.description: Mostly vegetarian but occasionally eats meat.
